title: Circles in Time
description: Investigative reporter Kendra O'Brien knows its a dream, so when Navarre de Galliard charges up in chain mail, she does what any modern career girl would do--she makes a pass at him. Only then does she realize that she isn't in Kansas anymore. This is 13th-century England, and he thinks she's the wicked witch!
author: Tess Mallory
